abstract: Michael R. Bloomberg has been cagey about whether he might acquire The Financial Times; he is reported to have said, "I buy it every day." Also, John McAfee on the run, reporters in tow; and John Silva, the engineer at a Los Angeles TV station who fashioned the first TV helicopter, dies at 92.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Bloomberg and The Financial Times, and the First 'Telecopter'
